subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Josh Beckett became the season’s second 10-game winner, pitching six scoreless innings before heavy rains ended his night, as the Boston Red Sox defeated the host Atlanta Braves, 4-0, last night.
snippet: Josh Beckett became the season’s second 10-game winner, pitching six scoreless innings before heavy rains ended his night, as the Boston Red Sox defeated the host Atlanta Braves, 4-0, last night.
